name: Cavin' Up
description:
This game was made for Zeno Game Jam.

This game is about you fighting zombies.

Zombies drop ammo boxes.
Bosses can drop ammo boxes AND med-kits.

Once you kill their bosses you're GOING UP to the next level.

Credits:
My friend that helped with the idea for the game.
My other friend for the music.
My brother who helped with literally everything, especially Playtesting.
